itinerary.title: Arrival in Kochi & Transfer to Munnar
itinerary.description: Upon arrival at Cochin airport or railway station, you will be greeted by our representative and transferred to the picturesque hill station of Munnar. Check into your hotel and spend the rest of the day at leisure. Overnight stay in Munnar.

itinerary.title: Munnar Sightseeing
itinerary.description: After breakfast, proceed for a full day of sightseeing in Munnar. Visit Mattupetty Dam, Echo Point, Kundala Lake, and the Tea Museum. Enjoy the lush green tea plantations and misty mountains. Return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Munnar to Thekkady
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel and drive to Thekkady, home to the Periyar National Park. Check into your hotel and later, go for a spice plantation tour to see various species of spices. In the evening, you can opt for a boat ride on Periyar Lake to spot wildlife. Overnight stay in Thekkady.

itinerary.title: Thekkady to Alleppey (Houseboat)
itinerary.description: After breakfast, drive to Alleppey, the 'Venice of the East'. Check into a traditional Kerala houseboat and enjoy a cruise through the serene backwaters. All meals will be served on board. Overnight stay on the houseboat.

itinerary.title: Alleppey to Kochi
itinerary.description: After breakfast on the houseboat, disembark and drive to Kochi. Check into your hotel and proceed for a half-day city tour of Fort Kochi, visiting the Chinese Fishing Nets, St. Francis Church, and the Dutch Palace. In the evening, you can enjoy a Kathakali dance performance. Overnight stay in Kochi.

itinerary.title: Departure from Kochi
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel and you will be transferred to Cochin airport or railway station for your onward journey, with sweet memories of your Kerala honeymoon.

seo.title: Kerala Honeymoon Package | 5 Nights 6 Days
seo.description: Book a romantic 5 nights 6 days Kerala honeymoon package. Explore Munnar, Thekkady, and Alleppey backwaters. Best deals on Kerala tours.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Delhi
itinerary.description: Arrive in Delhi, check into your hotel. Later, explore India Gate and the President's House. Overnight in Delhi.

itinerary.title: Delhi Sightseeing & Drive to Agra
itinerary.description: Visit Qutub Minar and Humayun's Tomb. In the afternoon, drive to Agra and check into your hotel. Overnight in Agra.

itinerary.title: Agra Sightseeing & Drive to Jaipur
itinerary.description: Visit the magnificent Taj Mahal at sunrise. After breakfast, visit Agra Fort. Later, drive to Jaipur, visiting Fatehpur Sikri en route. Overnight in Jaipur.

itinerary.title: Jaipur Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Explore the Pink City. Visit Amer Fort, City Palace, Jantar Mantar, and Hawa Mahal. Enjoy an evening at the local markets. Overnight in Jaipur.

itinerary.title: Jaipur to Delhi
itinerary.description: After breakfast, drive back to Delhi. Spend the evening at leisure for shopping or exploring more of the city. Overnight in Delhi.

itinerary.title: Departure from Delhi
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to the airport or railway station for your onward journey.

seo.title: Golden Triangle Tour | 5 Nights 6 Days
seo.description: Explore the classic Golden Triangle of India - Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur. Visit the Taj Mahal, Amer Fort, and more.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Jodhpur
itinerary.description: Arrive in Jodhpur, the Blue City. Check into your hotel. Visit Mehrangarh Fort and Jaswant Thada. Overnight in Jodhpur.

itinerary.title: Jodhpur to Jaisalmer
itinerary.description: After breakfast, drive to the Golden City, Jaisalmer. Check into your hotel and enjoy the evening at leisure. Overnight in Jaisalmer.

itinerary.title: Jaisalmer Sightseeing & Desert Camp
itinerary.description: Visit Jaisalmer Fort, Patwon Ki Haveli, and Gadisar Lake. In the evening, drive to Sam Sand Dunes for a camel safari and cultural program. Overnight stay in a desert camp.

itinerary.title: Jaisalmer to Jodhpur
itinerary.description: After breakfast at the camp, drive back to Jodhpur. Spend the day exploring the local markets. Overnight in Jodhpur.

itinerary.title: Departure from Jodhpur
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to the airport or railway station for your onward journey.

seo.title: Rajasthan Desert Safari Package | Jodhpur & Jaisalmer
seo.description: Experience the magic of the Thar Desert with our Rajasthan desert safari package. Explore Jodhpur and Jaisalmer and enjoy a night in a desert camp.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Chandigarh & Drive to Shimla
itinerary.description: Arrive at Chandigarh airport/station and drive to Shimla. Check into your hotel and relax. Overnight in Shimla.

itinerary.title: Shimla Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Kufri for its Himalayan views and adventure activities. In the evening, stroll on The Mall Road and The Ridge. Overnight in Shimla.

itinerary.title: Shimla to Manali
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a scenic drive to Manali. Check into your hotel and enjoy the evening by the Beas river. Overnight in Manali.

itinerary.title: Manali Local Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Hadimba Temple, Manu Temple, Vashisht Hot Springs, and the Tibetan Monastery. Overnight in Manali.

itinerary.title: Excursion to Solang Valley
itinerary.description: A day trip to Solang Valley for adventure activities like paragliding, zorbing, and skiing (in winter). Return to Manali for overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Manali to Chandigarh
itinerary.description: After breakfast, drive back to Chandigarh. Check into your hotel and relax. Overnight in Chandigarh.

itinerary.title: Departure from Chandigarh
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Chandigarh airport/station for your onward journey.

seo.title: Himachal Himalayan Adventure | Shimla & Manali
seo.description: Explore the best of Himachal with this 7-day adventure package covering Shimla and Manali. Enjoy scenic beauty and thrilling activities.

name: South India Temple Tour 6 Nights 7 Days

itinerary.title: Arrival in Chennai
itinerary.description: Arrive in Chennai, check into your hotel. Visit Marina Beach and Kapaleeshwarar Temple. Overnight in Chennai.

itinerary.title: Chennai to Mahabalipuram
itinerary.description: Drive to Mahabalipuram. Visit the Shore Temple, Pancha Rathas, and Arjuna's Penance. Overnight in Mahabalipuram.

itinerary.title: Mahabalipuram to Thanjavur
itinerary.description: Drive to Thanjavur. Visit the Brihadeeswarar Temple, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Overnight in Thanjavur.

itinerary.title: Thanjavur to Madurai
itinerary.description: Drive to Madurai. In the evening, witness the spectacular night ceremony at Meenakshi Amman Temple. Overnight in Madurai.

itinerary.title: Madurai Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Explore Madurai. Visit the Meenakshi Amman Temple in detail, Thirumalai Nayakkar Palace, and Gandhi Museum. Overnight in Madurai.

itinerary.title: Madurai to Chennai
itinerary.description: Drive or take a flight/train back to Chennai. Spend the evening at leisure for last-minute shopping. Overnight in Chennai.

itinerary.title: Departure from Chennai
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to the airport or railway station for your onward journey.

seo.title: South India Temple Tour Package | 7 Days
seo.description: Discover the architectural marvels of South India with our temple tour package covering Chennai, Mahabalipuram, Madurai, and more.
